SEARCH
Package UI

Class StaffUI

java.lang.Object
UI.BaseUI
UI.StaffUI
public class StaffUI extends BaseUI
The `StaffUI` class extends the `BaseUI` class and represents the user interface for managing staff schedule and holidays.
